meanings.definition: A North African village or settlement.
meanings.sent1: The douar was a small village nestled in the valley.
meanings.sent2: The douar bustled with activity as the villagers went about their day.
meanings.sent3: The douar's goats caused mischief by wandering into the neighboring fields.
meanings.sent4: The douar stood like a beacon of community in the vast desert landscape.
meanings.sent5: The colorful houses of the douar painted a vibrant picture against the sandy backdrop.

meanings.definition: A group of nomadic tents or huts.
meanings.sent1: The nomads set up their douar near the oasis for shelter.
meanings.sent2: The douar moved with the changing seasons, following the water source.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the tents of the douar.
meanings.sent4: The douar resembled a cluster of mushrooms in the barren desert.
meanings.sent5: The flickering campfire in the douar cast dancing shadows on the sand.
